title: Siblings through Breastfeeding - Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: alia says if my mother breastfed five times a baby boy under the age of two years along with me does he become Muharram well it doesn't matter whether he was breastfed with you or without you as long as a woman has breastfed a boy under the age of two years and she breasts him five meals or more immediately he becomes her son so the daughters before him and after him are his sisters likewise the children of this woman's are children so her grandchildren daughters and sons they also are considered to be the nephews and the nieces of that boy or girl and Lazo gel knows best
